array-bracket-spacing.name: array-bracket-spacing
array-bracket-spacing.description: 不要在中括号中添加空格
array-bracket-spacing.badExample: const foo = [ 1, 2, 3 ]; console.log(foo[ 0 ]);
array-bracket-spacing.goodExample: const foo = [1, 2, 3]; console.log(foo[0]);

array-callback-return.name: array-callback-return
array-callback-return.description: 数组的方法除了 forEach 之外，回调函数必须有返回值
array-callback-return.badExample: const foo = [1, 2, 3].map((num) => { console.log(num * num); });
array-callback-return.goodExample: const foo = [1, 2, 3].map(num => num * num);

arrow-body-style.name: arrow-body-style
arrow-body-style.description: 要求箭头函数体使用大括号

arrow-parens.name: arrow-parens
arrow-parens.description: 要求箭头函数的参数使用圆括号
arrow-parens.badExample: [1, 2, 3].map(number => { const nextNumber = number + 1; `A string containing the ${nextNumber}.`; }); [1, 2, 3].map(number => { `A long string with the ${number}. It’s so long that we don’t want it to take up space on the .map line!` }); [1, 2, 3].map(x => { const y = x + 1; return x * y; });
arrow-parens.goodExample: [1, 2, 3].map(number => `A string containing the ${number + 1}.`); [1, 2, 3].map(number => ( `A long string with the ${number}. It’s so long that we don’t want it to take up space on the .map line!` )); [1, 2, 3].map((x) => { const y = x + 1; return x * y; });

arrow-spacing.name: arrow-spacing
arrow-spacing.description: 强制箭头函数的箭头前后使用一致的空格

block-spacing.name: block-spacing
block-spacing.description: 要求打开的块标志和同一行上的标志拥有一致的间距。此规则还会在同一行关闭的块标记和前边的标记强制实施一致的间距。
block-spacing.badExample: function foo() {return true;} if (foo) { bar = 0;}
block-spacing.goodExample: function foo() { return true; } if (foo) { bar = 0; }

brace-style.name: brace-style
brace-style.description: 强制在代码块中使用一致的大括号风格
brace-style.badExample: if (test) { thing1(); thing2(); } else { thing3(); }
brace-style.goodExample: if (test) { thing1(); thing2(); } else { thing3(); }

camelcase.name: camelcase
camelcase.description: 使用驼峰命名法（camelCase）命名对象、函数和实例。
camelcase.badExample: const foo_bar = 1; function foo_baz() {}
camelcase.goodExample: const fooBar = 1; function fooBaz() {} const { foo_bar } = obj; fooBaz({ foo_bar: true });

comma-spacing.name: comma-spacing
comma-spacing.description: 强制在逗号前后使用一致的空格
comma-spacing.badExample: const arr = [1 , 2,3];
comma-spacing.goodExample: const arr = [1, 2, 3];

comma-style.name: comma-style
comma-style.description: 强制使用一致的逗号风格
comma-style.badExample: const story = [ once , upon , aTime ]; const hero = { firstName: 'Ada' , lastName: 'Lovelace' , birthYear: 1815 , superPower: 'computers' };
comma-style.goodExample: const story = [ once, upon, aTime, ]; const hero = { firstName: 'Ada', lastName: 'Lovelace', birthYear: 1815, superPower: 'computers', };

computed-property-spacing.name: computed-property-spacing
computed-property-spacing.description: 强制在计算的属性的方括号中使用一致的空格
computed-property-spacing.badExample: obj[foo ] obj[ 'foo'] var x = {[ b ]: a} obj[foo[ bar ]]
computed-property-spacing.goodExample: obj[foo]; obj['foo']; const x = { [b]: a }; obj[foo[bar]];

dot-notation.name: dot-notation
dot-notation.description: 禁止使用 foo['bar']，必须写成 foo.bar
dot-notation.badExample: foo['bar'] = 1;
dot-notation.goodExample: foo.bar = 1;

eol-last.name: eol-last
eol-last.description: 要求或禁止文件末尾存在空行
eol-last.badExample: import { es6 } from './TencentJSStyleGuide'; export default es6;>
eol-last.goodExample: import { es6 } from './TencentJSStyleGuide'; export default es6;

eqeqeq.name: eqeqeq
eqeqeq.description: 必须使用 === 或 !==，禁止使用 == 或 !=
eqeqeq.badExample: if (foo == 1) { } if (bar != null) { }
eqeqeq.goodExample: if (foo === 1) { } if (bar !== null) { }

func-call-spacing.name: func-call-spacing
func-call-spacing.description: 要求或禁止在函数标识符和其调用之间有空格
func-call-spacing.badExample: func (); func ();
func-call-spacing.goodExample: func();

func-style.name: func-style
func-style.description: 必须只使用函数声明或只使用函数表达式
func-style.goodExample: const foo = function foo() {};

function-paren-newline.name: function-paren-newline
function-paren-newline.description: 强制在函数括号内使用一致的换行
function-paren-newline.badExample: function foo(bar, baz, quux) { // ... } console.log(foo, bar, baz);
function-paren-newline.goodExample: function foo( bar, baz, quux, ) { // ... } console.log( foo, bar, baz, );

generator-star-spacing.name: generator-star-spacing
generator-star-spacing.description: 强制 generator 函数中 * 号周围使用一致的空格
generator-star-spacing.badExample: function * foo() { // ... } const bar = function * () { // ... }; const baz = function *() { // ... }; const quux = function*() { // ... }; function*foo1() { // ... } function *foo2() { // ... } function * foo3() { // ... }
generator-star-spacing.goodExample: function* foo() { // ... } const foo1 = function* foo() { // ... };

id-length.name: id-length
id-length.goodExample: const fo = 1;

implicit-arrow-linebreak.name: implicit-arrow-linebreak
implicit-arrow-linebreak.description: 强制隐式返回的箭头函数体的位置
implicit-arrow-linebreak.badExample: (foo) => bar; (foo) => (bar);
implicit-arrow-linebreak.goodExample: (foo) => bar; (foo) => (bar); (foo) => ( bar );

indent.name: indent
indent.badExample: if (foo) { const bar = 1; console.log(foo); switch (bar) { case 1: { console.log(bar); break; } } /** baz func */ function baz() { console.log(foo); } }
indent.goodExample: if (foo) { const bar = 1; console.log(foo); switch (bar) { case 1: { console.log(bar); break; } } /** baz func */ function baz() { console.log(foo); } }

key-spacing.name: key-spacing
key-spacing.description: 强制在对象字面量的属性中键和值之间使用一致的间距
key-spacing.badExample: var obj = { foo : 42 }; var obj2 = { foo:42 };
key-spacing.goodExample: const obj = { foo: 42 };

keyword-spacing.name: keyword-spacing
keyword-spacing.description: 强制在关键字前后使用一致的空格
keyword-spacing.badExample: if(isJedi) { fight (); }
keyword-spacing.goodExample: if (isJedi) { fight(); }

linebreak-style.name: linebreak-style
linebreak-style.description: 只允许使用 unix 的 LF 作为换行符，Windows 的 CRLF 不可以使用
linebreak-style.badExample: console.log( 'Hello', 'World', );
linebreak-style.goodExample: console.log( 'Hello', 'World', );

max-len.name: max-len
max-len.description: 强制一行的最大长度，限制单行不能超过100个字符，字符串和正则表达式除外。
max-len.badExample: const foo = jsonData && jsonData.foo && jsonData.foo.bar && jsonData.foo.bar.baz && jsonData.foo.bar.baz.quux && jsonData.foo.bar.baz.quux.xyzzy;
max-len.goodExample: const foo = jsonData && jsonData.foo && jsonData.foo.bar && jsonData.foo.bar.baz && jsonData.foo.bar.baz.quux && jsonData.foo.bar.baz.quux.xyzzy; $.ajax({ method: 'POST', url: 'https://airbnb.com/', data: { name: 'John' }, }) .done(() => console.log('Congratulations!')) .fail(() => console.log('You have failed this city.')); const str = 'The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog, the another quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog, the 3rd quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog'; const templateStr = `${jsonData.foo} The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog, the another quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog, the 3rd quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog`;

new-cap.name: new-cap
new-cap.description: 只有在命名构造器或者类的时候，才用帕斯卡拼命名法（PascalCase），即首字母大写。
new-cap.badExample: new foo();
new-cap.goodExample: new Foo(); new foo.bar();

newline-per-chained-call.name: newline-per-chained-call
newline-per-chained-call.description: 在编写多个方法链式调用(超过两个方法链式调用)时。 使用前导点，强调这行是一个方法调用，而不是一个语句。
newline-per-chained-call.badExample: $('#items').find('.selected').highlight().end().find('.open').updateCount();
newline-per-chained-call.goodExample: $('#items') .find('.selected') .highlight() .end() .find('.open') .updateCount();

no-array-constructor.name: no-array-constructor
no-array-constructor.description: 使用字面量语法创建数组。
no-array-constructor.badExample: const items = new Array();
no-array-constructor.goodExample: const items = [];

no-case-declarations.name: no-case-declarations
no-case-declarations.description: 在 case 和 default 的子句中，如果存在声明 (例如. let, const, function, 和 class)，使用大括号来创建块级作用域。
no-case-declarations.badExample: switch (foo) { case 1: const x = 1; break; }
no-case-declarations.goodExample: switch (foo) { case 1: { const x = 1; break; } }

no-confusing-arrow.name: no-confusing-arrow
no-confusing-arrow.description: 避免搞混箭头函数符号 (=>) 和比较运算符 (<=, >=)。
no-confusing-arrow.badExample: const itemHeight = item => item.height > 256 ? item.largeSize : item.smallSize; const anotherItemHeight = (item) => item.height > 256 ? item.largeSize : item.smallSize;
no-confusing-arrow.goodExample: const itemHeight = item => (item.height > 256 ? item.largeSize : item.smallSize); const anotherItemHeight = (item) => { const { height, largeSize, smallSize } = item; return height > 256 ? largeSize : smallSize; };

no-const-assign.name: no-const-assign
no-const-assign.description: 禁止对使用 const 定义的常量重新赋值
no-const-assign.badExample: const foo = 1; foo = 2;
no-const-assign.goodExample: let foo = 1; foo = 2; for (const bar of [1, 2, 3]) { console.log(bar); }

no-dupe-class-members.name: no-dupe-class-members
no-dupe-class-members.description: 禁止重复定义类的成员
no-dupe-class-members.badExample: class Foo { bar() { return 1; } bar() { return 2; } }
no-dupe-class-members.goodExample: class Foo { bar() { return 1; } }

no-else-return.name: no-else-return
no-else-return.description: 禁止在 else 内使用 return，必须改为提前结束
no-else-return.badExample: function foo() { if (bar) { return bar; } else { return baz; } }
no-else-return.goodExample: function foo() { if (bar) { return bar; } return baz; }

no-eval.name: no-eval
no-eval.badExample: eval('const foo = 0');
no-eval.goodExample: const foo = 0;

no-iterator.name: no-iterator
no-iterator.comments:
/**
     * 不要使用迭代器。
     * @reason 推荐使用 JavaScript 的高阶函数代替 for-in。
     */
no-iterator.badExample: Foo.prototype.__iterator__ = function() { return new FooIterator(this); };
no-iterator.goodExample: const foo = {}; foo[Symbol.iterator] = function* () { yield 1; yield 2; yield 3; }; console.log([...foo]); // [1, 2, 3]
no-iterator.reason: 推荐使用 JavaScript 的高阶函数代替 for-in。

no-loop-func.name: no-loop-func
no-loop-func.description: 禁止在循环内的函数内部出现循环体条件语句中定义的变量
no-loop-func.badExample: for (var i = 10; i; i--) { (function() { return i; })(); }
no-loop-func.goodExample: for (let i = 10; i; i--) { (function () { return i; }()); }

no-mixed-operators.name: no-mixed-operators
no-mixed-operators.description:
禁止混合使用不同的操作符:
- 禁止 `%`, `**` 之间混用
- 禁止 `%` 与其它运算符之间混用
- 禁止乘除运算符之间混用
- 禁止位运算符之间的任何混用
- 禁止比较运算符之间混用
- 禁止 `&&`, `||` 之间混用
no-mixed-operators.comments:
/**
     * 禁止混合使用不同的操作符:
     * - 禁止 `%`, `**` 之间混用
     * - 禁止 `%` 与其它运算符之间混用
     * - 禁止乘除运算符之间混用
     * - 禁止位运算符之间的任何混用
     * - 禁止比较运算符之间混用
     * - 禁止 `&&`, `||` 之间混用
     */
no-mixed-operators.badExample: // bad const foo = a && b < 0 || c > 0 || d + 1 === 0; // bad const bar = a ** b - 5 % d; // bad, 可能陷入一种 (a || b) && c 的思考 if (a || b && c) { return d; } // bad const bar1 = a + b / c * (d / e);
no-mixed-operators.goodExample: function operators() { // good const foo = (a && b < 0) || (c > 0) || (d + 1 === 0); // good const bar = (a ** b) - (5 % d); // good if (a || (b && c)) { return d; } // good const bar1 = a + (b / c) * (d / e); }

no-multi-assign.name: no-multi-assign
no-multi-assign.description: 禁止连续赋值，比如 foo = bar = 1
no-multi-assign.badExample: (function example() { /** * JavaScript 把它解释为 * let a = ( b = ( c = 1 ) ); * let 关键词只适用于变量 a，变量 b 和变量 c 则变成了全局变量。 */ let a = b = c = 1; }()); // throws ReferenceError console.log(a); // 1 console.log(b); // 1 console.log(c);
no-multi-assign.goodExample: (function example() { const a = 1; const b = a; const c = a; }()); // throws ReferenceError console.log(a); // throws ReferenceError console.log(b); // throws ReferenceError console.log(c);

no-multiple-empty-lines.name: no-multiple-empty-lines
no-multiple-empty-lines.description: 不要使用多个空行填充代码。
no-multiple-empty-lines.badExample: var foo = 5; var bar = 3;
no-multiple-empty-lines.goodExample: const foo = 5; const bar = 3;

no-nested-ternary.name: no-nested-ternary
no-nested-ternary.description: 禁止使用嵌套的三元表达式，比如 a ? b : c ? d : e
no-nested-ternary.badExample: const foo = a ? b : c ? d : e;
no-nested-ternary.goodExample: let foo; if (a) { foo = b; } else if (c) { foo = d; } else { foo = e; }

no-new-func.name: no-new-func
no-new-func.comments:
/**
     * 禁止使用 new Function
     * @reason 这和 eval 是等价的
     */
no-new-func.badExample: const foo = new Function('a', 'b', 'return a + b');
no-new-func.goodExample: const foo = function(a, b) { return a + b; };
no-new-func.reason: 这和 eval 是等价的

no-new-object.name: no-new-object
no-new-object.badExample: const foo = new Object();
no-new-object.goodExample: const foo = {};

no-new-wrappers.name: no-new-wrappers
no-new-wrappers.description: 禁止使用 new 来生成 String, Number 或 Boolean
no-new-wrappers.badExample: const s = new String('foo'); const n = new Number(1); const b = new Boolean(true);
no-new-wrappers.goodExample: const s = String(someValue); const n = Number(someValue); const b = Boolean(someValue);

no-param-reassign.name: no-param-reassign
no-param-reassign.description: 禁止对函数的参数重新赋值
no-param-reassign.badExample: function f1(obj) { obj.key = 1; } function f2(obj) { obj = 123; }
no-param-reassign.goodExample: function f3(obj) { const key = Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(obj, 'key') ? obj.key : 1; } function f4(obj) { let foo = obj; foo = 123; } // 对 Koa 等常用库豁免 router.post('/', ctx => { ctx.body = { code: 0 }; });

no-plusplus.name: no-plusplus
no-plusplus.badExample: foo++;
no-plusplus.goodExample: foo += 1; for (let i = 0; i < 10; i += 1) { console.log(i); } // Not good but accepatble so far. for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) { console.log(i); }

no-prototype-builtins.name: no-prototype-builtins
no-prototype-builtins.description: 禁止使用 hasOwnProperty, isPrototypeOf 或 propertyIsEnumerable
no-prototype-builtins.badExample: foo.hasOwnProperty('bar');
no-prototype-builtins.goodExample: Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(foo, 'bar');

no-restricted-properties.name: no-restricted-properties
no-restricted-properties.description: 计算指数时，可以使用 ** 运算符。
no-restricted-properties.badExample: Math.pow(2, 3);
no-restricted-properties.goodExample: 2 ** 3;

no-restricted-syntax.name: no-restricted-syntax

value.message: for..in loops iterate over the entire prototype chain, which is virtually never what you want. Use Object.{keys,values,entries}, and iterate over the resulting array.
Labels are a form of GOTO; using them makes code confusing and hard to maintain and understand.
`with` is disallowed in strict mode because it makes code impossible to predict and optimize.

no-restricted-syntax.description: 推荐使用 JavaScript 的高阶函数代替 for-in
no-restricted-syntax.badExample: let sum = 0; for (let num in numbers) { sum += num; } sum === 15;
no-restricted-syntax.goodExample: let sum = 0; numbers.forEach((num) => { sum += num; }); sum === 15;

no-undef.name: no-undef
no-undef.description: 变量应先声明再使用，禁止引用任何未声明的变量，除非你明确知道引用的变量存在于当前作用域链上。
no-undef.badExample: const foo = function foo(bar) { let input = args; return { bar, args } }
no-undef.goodExample: const foo = function foo(bar) { const { args } = bar; let input = args; return { bar, args, }; };

no-underscore-dangle.name: no-underscore-dangle
no-underscore-dangle.description: 禁止变量名出现下划线
no-underscore-dangle.badExample: let foo_; let __proto__ = {}; foo._bar();
no-underscore-dangle.goodExample: const _ = require('underscore'); obj.__proto__ = {}; const file = __filename;

no-unneeded-ternary.name: no-unneeded-ternary
no-unneeded-ternary.description: 必须使用 !a 替代 a ? false : true
no-unneeded-ternary.badExample: const foo = a ? false : true;
no-unneeded-ternary.goodExample: const foo = !a;

no-unused-vars.name: no-unused-vars
no-unused-vars.description:
已定义的变量必须使用
但不检查最后一个使用的参数之前的参数
也不检查 rest 属性的兄弟属性
no-unused-vars.comments:
/**
     * 已定义的变量必须使用
     * 但不检查最后一个使用的参数之前的参数
     * 也不检查 rest 属性的兄弟属性
     */
no-unused-vars.badExample: let foo = 1; foo = 2; function bar(baz) { } const { baz, ...rest } = data; (function (foo, bar, baz, qux) { return bar; })();
no-unused-vars.goodExample: const foo = 1; console.log(foo); function bar(baz) { console.log(baz); } bar(); const { baz, ...rest } = data; console.log(rest); try { } catch (e) { } (function (foo, bar, baz, _qux) { return baz; })();

no-useless-constructor.name: no-useless-constructor
no-useless-constructor.description: 禁止出现没必要的 constructor
no-useless-constructor.badExample: class Jedi { constructor() {} getName() { return this.name; } } class Rey extends Jedi { // 这种构造函数是不需要写的 constructor(...args) { super(...args); } }
no-useless-constructor.goodExample: class Jedi { name = 'Jedi'; } class Rey extends Jedi { constructor(...args) { super(...args); this.name = 'Rey'; } }

no-useless-escape.name: no-useless-escape
no-useless-escape.description: 禁止出现没必要的转义
no-useless-escape.badExample: "\'"; '\"'; '\#'; '\e'; `\"`; `\"${foo}\"`; `\#{foo}`; /\!/; /\@/;
no-useless-escape.goodExample: '\''; '\x12'; '\u00a9'; 'xs\u2111'; `\``; `\${${foo}}`; `$\{${foo}}`; /\\/g; /\t/g; /\w\$\*\^\./;

no-var.name: no-var
no-var.badExample: var foo = 1;
no-var.goodExample: let foo = 1; const bar = 2;

nonblock-statement-body-position.name: nonblock-statement-body-position
nonblock-statement-body-position.badExample: // bad if (test) return false; // bad let condition = true; let test = 1; // 在缩进不规范的时候，容易造成误解 if (condition) condition = false; test = 2;
nonblock-statement-body-position.goodExample: function foo() { // good if (test) return false; // good if (test) { return false; } } // bad function bar() { return false; } // good function baz() { return false; }

object-curly-spacing.name: object-curly-spacing
object-curly-spacing.description: 强制在大括号中使用一致的空格
object-curly-spacing.badExample: const foo = {clark: 'kent'};
object-curly-spacing.goodExample: const foo = { clark: 'kent' };

object-shorthand.name: object-shorthand
object-shorthand.description: 将对象方法、属性简写，且间歇属性放在前面。
object-shorthand.badExample: const value = 1; const atom = { value: value, addValue: function (newValue) { return atom.value + newValue; }, };
object-shorthand.goodExample: const value = 1; const atom = { value, addValue(newValue) { return atom.value + newValue; }, };

one-var.name: one-var
one-var.description: 禁止变量申明时用逗号一次申明多个
one-var.badExample: let foo, bar; const baz = 1, qux = 2;
one-var.goodExample: let foo; let bar; const baz = 1; const qux = 2;

operator-linebreak.name: operator-linebreak
operator-linebreak.description: 避免在赋值语句 = 前后换行。如果你的代码单行长度超过了 max-len 定义的长度而不得不换行，那么使用括号包裹。
operator-linebreak.badExample: const foo = 'superLongLongLongLongLongLongLongLongString'; const bar = superLongLongLongLongLongLongLongLongFunctionName(); const fullHeight = borderTop + innerHeight + borderBottom; const anotherHeight = borderTop + innerHeight + borderBottom; const thirdHeight = ( borderTop + innerHeight + borderBottom );
operator-linebreak.goodExample: const foo = 'superLongLongLongLongLongLongLongLongString'; const bar = ( superLongLongLongLongLongLongLongLongFunctionName() ); const fooHeight = borderTop + innerHeight + borderBottom; const anotherHeight = borderTop + innerHeight + borderBottom; const thirdHeight = ( borderTop + innerHeight + borderBottom );

padded-blocks.name: padded-blocks
padded-blocks.badExample: // bad function bar() { console.log(foo); } // bad if (baz) { console.log(qux); } else { console.log(foo); } // bad class Foo { constructor(bar) { this.bar = bar; } }
padded-blocks.goodExample: // good function bar() { console.log(foo); } // good if (baz) { console.log(qux); } else { console.log(foo); }

prefer-arrow-callback.name: prefer-arrow-callback
prefer-arrow-callback.description: 要求回调函数使用箭头函数
prefer-arrow-callback.badExample: [1, 2, 3].map(function (x) { const y = x + 1; return x * y; });
prefer-arrow-callback.goodExample: [1, 2, 3].map((x) => { const y = x + 1; return x * y; });

prefer-const.name: prefer-const
prefer-const.description: 申明后不再被修改的变量必须使用 const 来申明
prefer-const.badExample: let foo = 1; let { bar, baz } = obj; for (let i in [1, 2, 3]) { console.log(i); }
prefer-const.goodExample: const foo = 1; const { bar, baz } = obj; for (const i in [1, 2, 3]) { console.log(i); }

prefer-destructuring.name: prefer-destructuring
prefer-destructuring.badExample: function getFullName(user) { const firstName = user.firstName; const lastName = user.lastName; return `${firstName} ${lastName}`; } function foo() { let digits; const matches = '123'.match(/^(\d+)$/); if (matches) { digits = matches[1]; } }
prefer-destructuring.goodExample: function getFullName(user) { const { firstName, lastName } = user; return `${firstName} ${lastName}`; } function foo() { let digits; const matches = '123'.match(/^(\d+)$/); if (matches) { [, digits] = matches; } }

prefer-rest-params.name: prefer-rest-params
prefer-rest-params.description: 必须使用 ...args 而不是 arguments
prefer-rest-params.badExample: function foo() { console.log(arguments); }
prefer-rest-params.goodExample: function foo(...args) { console.log(args); }

prefer-spread.name: prefer-spread
prefer-spread.description: 必须使用 ... 而不是 apply，比如 foo(...args)
prefer-spread.badExample: const x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]; console.log.apply(console, x);
prefer-spread.goodExample: const x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]; console.log(...x);

prefer-template.name: prefer-template
prefer-template.description: 必须使用模版字符串而不是字符串连接
prefer-template.badExample: 'Hello, ' + name;
prefer-template.goodExample: `Hello, ${name}`;

quote-props.name: quote-props
quote-props.description: 要求对象字面量属性名称用引号括起来
quote-props.badExample: const bad = { 'foo': 3, 'bar': 4, 'data-blah': 5, };
quote-props.goodExample: const good = { foo: 3, bar: 4, 'data-blah': 5, };

quotes.name: quotes
quotes.description: 使用单引号 '' 定义字符串

radix.name: radix
radix.description: parseInt 必须传入第二个参数
radix.badExample: const foo = parseInt('071'); // 57
radix.goodExample: const foo = parseInt('071', 10); // 71

semi.name: semi
semi.badExample: const jedis = {} ['luke', 'leia'].some((name) => { jedis[name] = true return true })
semi.goodExample: const jedis = {}; ['luke', 'leia'].some((name) => { jedis[name] = true; return true; });

space-before-blocks.name: space-before-blocks
space-before-blocks.description: 强制在块之前使用一致的空格
space-before-blocks.badExample: const f = function (){}; const g = function a(){};
space-before-blocks.goodExample: const x = function () {}; const y = function a() {};

space-before-function-paren.name: space-before-function-paren
space-before-function-paren.description: 强制在 function 的左括号之前使用一致的空格
space-before-function-paren.badExample: const h = function() {};
space-before-function-paren.goodExample: const x = function () {}; const y = function a() {};

space-in-parens.name: space-in-parens
space-in-parens.description: 强制在圆括号内使用一致的空格
space-in-parens.badExample: function bar( foo ) { return foo; } if ( foo ) { console.log(foo); }
space-in-parens.goodExample: function bar(foo) { return foo; } if (foo) { console.log(foo); }

space-infix-ops.name: space-infix-ops
space-infix-ops.description: 要求操作符周围有空格
space-infix-ops.badExample: const x=y+5;
space-infix-ops.goodExample: const x = y + 5;

spaced-comment.name: spaced-comment
spaced-comment.description: 注释的斜线或 * 后必须有空格
spaced-comment.badExample: //foo /*bar */ /**baz */
spaced-comment.goodExample: // foo /* bar */ /** baz */

template-curly-spacing.name: template-curly-spacing
template-curly-spacing.description: 要求或禁止模板字符串中的嵌入表达式周围空格的使用

wrap-iife.name: wrap-iife
wrap-iife.description: 要求立即执行的函数使用括号括起来
